name: Scholar
tagline: Take notes on any webpage. At any time. Anywhere.
body:
### About
***
> Paper is no longer a big part of my day.

\- Bill Gates

Let paper also be no longer a big part of your day. No more printing articles to take notes in the margin. Just push a button and start typing. Enjoy!
***

### Download
***
Coming Soon
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
